question: The Constitution of India can be amended by?
option1: Amendment by simple majority of the Parliament
option2: Amendment by special majority of the Parliament
option3: Amendment by special majority of the Parliament and the ratification of half of the state legislatures
explanation:
The Constitution of India can be amended in three ways:
(a) Amendment by simple majority of the Parliament,
(b) Amendment by special majority of the Parliament, and
(c) Amendment by special majority of the Parliament and the ratification of half of the state legislatures.
